meanings.definition: A small van, typically with seating for seven passengers.
meanings.sent1: Our family decided to take a road trip in a minivan.
meanings.sent2: The minivan pulled up to the school to pick up the children.
meanings.sent3: The minivan felt like a cozy living room on wheels.
meanings.sent4: The minivan was a trusty steed for our adventures.
meanings.sent5: The bright red minivan stood out in the parking lot.

meanings.definition: A type of automobile designed for transporting passengers.
meanings.sent1: The minivan was perfect for carpooling to soccer practice.
meanings.sent2: She loaded the groceries into the back of the minivan.
meanings.sent3: The minivan seemed to have a mind of its own, always ready for a trip.
meanings.sent4: The minivan became a symbol of freedom for the group of friends.
meanings.sent5: The sleek minivan glided smoothly down the highway.
